server.server module¶

class server.server.ClientInstance(session, addr)[source]¶

Bases: object

action_handler(msg, clients)[source]¶

process messages from client :param msg: Any type of @dataclass from .messages

add_contact(msg: messages.AddContact)[source]¶

add specific user to contact list :param msg: message from user :type msg: messages.AddContact

authenticate(msg: messages.Authenticate)[source]¶

authenticating user on server, find user in DB, create user if not exists, check password :param msg: user credential :type msg: messages.Authenticate :return: messages.Authenticate

client_disconnect()[source]¶

disconnect client from server, set client.status = ‘disconnected’ :return: False

client_presence(msg: messages.Presence)[source]¶

process Presence message from client :param msg: client answer to Probe :type msg: messages.Presence

del_contact(msg: messages.DelContact)[source]¶

add specific user to contact list :param msg: message from user :type msg: messages.DelContact

encrypt_data(data)[source]¶

encrypt data with session key :param data: Any type of @dataclass from .messages :return: encrypted data

feed_data(data)[source]¶

send data to client Encrypt data if client exists in DB :param data: Any type of @dataclass from .messages or close

get_contacts(msg: messages.GetContacts)[source]¶

get contact list for user :param msg: messages.GetContacts

get_data()[source]¶
get_filtered_users(msg: messages.FilterClients)[source]¶

send filtered list of users from DB to client :param msg: message with mask

get_messages(msg: messages.GetMessages)[source]¶

find in DB and send chat messages between client and specific user :param msg: message from client

join(msg: messages.Join)[source]¶

join client to channel :param msg: message from client :type msg: messages.Join

leave(msg: messages.Leave)[source]¶

leave client from channel :param msg: message from client :type msg: messages.Leave

on_msg(msg: messages.Msg, clients)[source]¶

process messages.Msg from client, store message in DB, send to recipient, if his online :param msg: message from client :type msg: messages.Msg :param clients: list of dict {conn: Client} with connected users

probe()[source]¶

send messages.Probe request to client, if client doesn’t authenticated just send informational messages.Response :return: messages.Probe or messages.Response

send_message(msg)[source]¶

send any type of messages to client :param msg: any type of messages to client :return: any type of messages to client

send_response(response, message)[source]¶

send response to user :param response: response code :param message: response text :return: messages.Response

send_secret_key(msg: messages.SendKey)[source]¶

encrypt session key with client public key and send to client :param msg: message with client public key :type msg: messages.SendKey
